name: courier_autodeliver
description: Toggle auto delivering of items.

name: tiny_craggy_exterior
description: Enemies that attack Tiny have a **20%** chance of being stunned for **1** second and taking **100** damage. Affects enemies within 400 range of him. Procs after an attack impacts, and does not affect spell immune enemies.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Craggy Exterior.

name: lone_druid_entangling_claws
description: Cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the target enemy unit and causes them to take more damage from attacks. Enemies can still move and attack while entangled.

name: riki_permanent_invisibility
description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus movement speed
lore: Riki comes for you.
note:
Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

name: kunkka_torrent_storm
description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area within **1100** range of the target position once every **0.25** for **4** seconds.
lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Torrent Storm.

name: enchantress_bunny_hop
description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the **2** furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + **100**.
lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Sproink.

name: rattletrap_overclocking
description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.
lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Overclocking.

name: pudge_eject
description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
lore: Allies emerge forever changed.

name: meepo_megameepo_fling
description: In MegaMeepo form, Meepo flings the topmost meepo towards a target within a **900** range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: MegaMeepo Fling.

name: lycan_wolf_bite
description: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain **30%** Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within **1200** range of each other.
lore: Does this bite look infected?
note: Wolf Bite cooldown matches the cooldown of the current level of Shapeshift.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Wolf Bite.

name: luna_lunar_grace
description: Dispels negative buffs and grants you bonus attack speed. Has an increased effect during the night.
lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

name: treant_natures_grasp
description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

name: drow_ranger_multishot
description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to **1.75** seconds.
lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.
note:
Arrow base damage pierces magic immunity.
Frost Arrows' damage and slow do not pierce magic immunity.

name: special_bonus_unique_snapfire_6
localized_name: Lil' Shredder Uses 100% of Your Attack Damage

name: miniboss_radiance
description: Deals **30** damage to all units within **1200** range every second.

name: roshan_halloween_summon
description: Roshan calls a group of Roshlings to aid him.

name: roshan_halloween_fireball
description: Roshan launches a number of slow moving fireballs at all nearby enemies.

name: juggernaut_swift_slash
description: Performs a short Omnislash for **1** seconds.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Swiftslash.

name: terrorblade_terror_wave
description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Terror Wave.

name: special_bonus_unique_sand_king_4
description: Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by **35%** and miss **35%** of their attacks.

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_5
localized_name: +0% Hunter In The Night Movement Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_5
localized_name: +20 Movespeed Aura to Beastmaster and his units
description: The Movespeed Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all units under his control.

name: keeper_of_the_light_radiant_bind
description: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.

name: tinker_shrink_ray
description: Reduces the enemy target size and lowers their max health by 20% for **6** seconds.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Shrink Ray.

name: shadow_shaman_serpentine
description: Creates a line of **8** Serpent Wards.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Serpentine.

name: brewmaster_primal_split_cancel
description: Cancel the Primal Split.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Primal Split Cancel.

name: magnataur_greater_shockwave
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Rolling Shockwave.

name: leshrac_greater_lightning_storm
description: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nihilism.

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_8
localized_name: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

name: antimage_mana_overload
description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Blink Fragment.

name: meepo_petrify
description:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for **3**s. Restores **25%** of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
shard_description: Adds new ability: Dig.

name: riki_poison_dart
description: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep.  The target will wake up at the end of the duration or if they take too much damage. Upon waking up, the target takes damage and is slowed.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Sleeping Dart.

name: omniknight_angelic_flight
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Angelic Flight.

name: jakiro_liquid_ice
description: Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack. Enemies hit are slowed for **4** seconds and are damaged for a percent of their max health plus a base amount every **1** second for **4** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Liquid Frost.

name: grimstroke_ink_over
description: Covers an enemy in ink for **6** seconds, slowing their attack speed by **50**, movement speed by **25%** and dealing a total of **320** damage over its duration.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Ink Over.

name: dazzle_rain_of_vermin
scepter_description: Adds new ability: .

name: windrunner_focusfire_cancel
description: End your Focus Fire early.

name: venomancer_area_poison
description: Creates a **650** AoE pool of poison at the target location, dealing another instance of Poison Nova damage and slows by 20%. If an enemy dies in the area, a Plague Ward is spawned.

name: crystal_maiden_let_it_go
description: Creates an icy path towards the targeted direction, allowing you to move faster and path freely. Enemies walking over this path will move slower.

name: beastmaster_mark_of_the_beast
scepter_description: Adds new ability: .

name: kunkka_tidal_wave
description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Tidal Wave.

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_6
localized_name: +250 Max Health Aura to Beastmaster and his units
description: The Max Health Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all units under his control.

name: special_bonus_unique_clockwerk_6
description: Also provides 50% magic resistance while Debuff Immune.

name: special_bonus_unique_invoker_12
description: Allows Ice Wall to be cast as a Vector Target ability with **1200** cast range.

name: naga_siren_crit
description: Attacks inflict critical damage.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Critical Strike.

name: special_bonus_unique_keeper_of_the_light_10
localized_name: +1.5s Solar Bind Stun when target is fully slowed

name: furion_greater_sprout
description: Creates a larger circle of trees in a 300 AoE for **6** seconds. Ensnares enemies inside for 2 seconds, dealing 150 damage per second.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Greater Sprout.

name: rattletrap_jetpack
description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Jetpack.

name: life_stealer_ghoul_frenzy
description: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for **1.5** seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.

name: witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo
description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Voodoo Switcheroo.

name: broodmother_silken_bola
description: Deals impact damage, then slows the target and causes them to miss some attacks. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.

name: zuus_heavenly_jump
description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

name: alchemist_berserk_potion
description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
shard_description: Adds new ability: Berserk Potion.

name: bristleback_hairball
description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies with Viscous Nasal Goo stacks and Quill Spray.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Hairball.

name: rubick_telekinesis_land_self
description: Chooses the location you will land when Telekinesis finishes.

name: ogre_magi_smash
description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next **3** attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.
note: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an **1000** area of effect to receive Fire Shield.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fire Shield.

name: magnataur_horn_toss
description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend **0.6** seconds in the air, and are stunned while in the air and an additional amount of time after landing.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Horn Toss.

name: tinker_defense_matrix
description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.

name: shredder_flamethrower
description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Flamethrower.

name: windrunner_gale_force
description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Gale Force.

name: omniknight_hammer_of_purity
description: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.
shard_description: Omniknight is healed for **30%** of the damage dealt by Hammer of Purity. Every **6** seconds, his next attack will fire a Hammer of Purity at the target.

name: dragon_knight_fireball
description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fireball.

name: necrolyte_death_seeker
description: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Death Seeker.

name: phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives
description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fan of Knives.

name: slark_fish_bait
description: Reduce movement speed of an enemy by **30%** for **6** seconds and provide true sight vision over them. If Slark pounces on the enemy during that time, he will be rewarded with **75** Attack Speed for the duration of the Leash.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fish Bait.

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_7
localized_name: Brain Sap Pure and Pierces Immunity

name: storm_spirit_electric_rave
description: Grants Storm Spirit and allied heroes within **750** AoE of him **3** Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to **12** seconds or until the charges are depleted.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Electric Rave.

name: visage_silent_as_the_grave
description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts **35** seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Silent as the Grave.

name: dark_seer_normal_punch
description: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past **3** seconds. Max power is reached after **1100** distance moved.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Normal Punch.

name: brewmaster_void_astral_pulse
description: Disarms and slows movement speed of nearby enemies.

name: sniper_concussive_grenade
description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Concussive Grenade.

name: special_bonus_unique_slardar_6
localized_name: Corrosive Hazed targets leave Puddle trails
description: Trails are %bonus_puddle_radius% units wide and last %bonus_puddle_duration% seconds

name: terrorblade_demon_zeal
description: Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain **50%** of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal
shard_description: Adds new ability: Demon Zeal.

name: beastmaster_hawk_dive
description: Flies towards the target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it.

name: medusa_cold_blooded
description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Cold Blooded.

name: special_bonus_unique_mirana_5
description: Evasion works even when heroes are visible

name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_5
description: Enemies damaged by Sonic Wave are forced to run away from Queen of Pain for **1.5** seconds.

name: troll_warlord_rampage
description: Grants all allied Heroes globally a bonus based on whichever stance Troll Warlord is currently in. Ranged provides bonus Attack Speed and melee provides Status Resistance.

name: slark_depth_shroud
description: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Depth Shroud.

name: special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_8
localized_name: +400 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form

name: special_bonus_unique_kunkka_6
localized_name: +25% X Marks the Spot Move Speed
description: Affects Allies positively and Enemies negatively

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_8
localized_name: +120 Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range

name: special_bonus_unique_lion_11
localized_name: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill

name: special_bonus_unique_ogre_magi_5
description: Also reduces cooldown of Unrefined Fireblast

name: special_bonus_unique_naga_siren_7
localized_name: Song of the Siren heals allies 7% Max HP/s

name: special_bonus_unique_slark_5
localized_name: +1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

name: skywrath_mage_shield_of_the_scion
description: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a buff that grants bonus Intelligence and Armor. Each charge stacks independently.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Shield of the Scion.

name: special_bonus_unique_warlock_10
localized_name: +10 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies
description: Maximum of +70 Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_luna_8
localized_name: 2 Moon Glaives fired on Lucent Beam
description: Does not fire Glaives on Beams from Eclipse

name: harpy_scout_take_off
description: Harpy Scout gains flying movement at the cost of movement speed. Consumes mana while active.

name: kobold_tunneler_prospecting
description: Kobolds are adept at finding gold, increasing nearby allied heroes' GPM.

name: furbolg_enrage_attack_speed
description: When Hellbear dies, all nearby allies go into a frenzy gaining attack speed for a short amount of time.

name: furbolg_enrage_damage
description: When Hellbear Smasher dies, all nearby allies go into a rampage gaining bonus attack damage for a short amount of time.

name: forest_troll_high_priest_heal_amp_aura
description: Provides bonus Heal Amplification to all nearby allies.

name: abyssal_underlord_dark_portal
description:
Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for **3.5** seconds to teleport to the other side. Allies that pass through the portal temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Portals have to be at least **2000** away from each other.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base, in front of your fountain.
lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
scepter_description: Summons a Pit of Malice around each of the portals.

name: enraged_wildkin_hurricane
description: The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a hurricane that can push a unit in the direction of Wildwing Ripper's choice.

name: broodmother_sticky_snare
description: Broodmother may create up to **5** invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
lore: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Spinner's Snare.

name: kobold_disarm
description: Every third attack Kobold Soldier will disarm its target temporarily. Attack counter doesn't increase while ability is on cooldown.

name: special_bonus_unique_bounty_hunter_6
localized_name: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

name: techies_sticky_bomb
description: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for **3** seconds.
lore: Such revolutionary brilliance was meant to be shared.

name: ogre_bruiser_ogre_smash
description: Ogre slowly charges a big attack stunning for **2.4** seconds and dealing **200**/**250**/**300**/**400** + **8%** of their current HP as damage to all units in front of him.

name: techies_reactive_tazer
description: Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed and get a Basic Dispel. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.
lore: A steady bomb hand prefers an abundance of personal space.
shard_description: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

name: fel_beast_haunt
description: Silences target unit.

name: berserker_troll_break
description: Whenever Hill Troll Berserker attacks a unit it applies break to it.

name: hill_troll_rally
description: Skeleton's allies gain bonus attack damage. This Aura stacks.

name: giant_wolf_intimidate
description: The Giant Wolf's ferocious roar reduces all nearby enemies total attack damage.

name: omniknight_martyr
description: Grants Debuff Immunity to the target, as well as bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs on them.
lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

name: special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_9
localized_name: +2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

name: bloodseeker_blood_mist
description: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.
note: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Blood Mist.

name: special_bonus_unique_primal_beast_pulverize_pierces_magic_immunity
description: Damage is changed to Pure

name: tinker_warp_grenade
description: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for **3** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Warp Flare.

name: creep_siege
description: Reinforced Units and Buildings Deal Bonus Damage to other Reinforced Units and Buildings and take less attack damage from other units.

name: creep_piercing
description: Piercing Units Deal Bonus Damage to non-hero, non-heavy units and reduced damage to heroes and heavy units.

name: creep_irresolute
description: Runty Units Deal reduced damage to hero units.

name: shadow_demon_demonic_cleanse
description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
note:
Can be cast on invulnerable units.
Negative buffs are continously removed from the target for the duration of the Cleanse.
scepter_description: Cooldown is removed, replaced with **2** charges that replenish every **60** seconds.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Demonic Cleanse.

name: special_bonus_unique_elder_titan_bonus_spirit_speed
localized_name: +2% Astral Spirit Move Speed Per Hero

name: clinkz_empty1
description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Death Pact.

name: ancient_rock_golem_weakening_aura
description: The Rock Golem's imposing figure makes enemies more susceptible to Physical Damage.

name: black_drake_magic_amplification_aura
description: The Black Drakes' gaze make enemies more susceptible to Spell Damage.

name: special_bonus_unique_legion_commander_8
localized_name: Press the Attack grants 1.5s Debuff Immunity
description: Also increases magic resistance by 50%

name: oracle_rain_of_destiny
description: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced heal amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming heal amplification.
lore: Through mixture of the astral and the atmospheric, Nerif bends a single reality into paradoxical alignment.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Rain of Destiny.

name: dazzle_good_juju
description: Whenever Dazzle Casts a Spell, all other abilities currently on cooldown have their cooldowns reduced.
lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.
scepter_description: Good Juju reduces all item Cooldowns by **50%** and becomes an active ability that can be cast on allied units to refresh all item cooldowns.

name: warpine_raider_seed_shot
description: Hucks a seed at a target, slowing and damaging it. The seed can bounce multiple times to nearby targets.

name: frostbitten_golem_time_warp_aura
description: Coming from a different era, the Frostbitten Golem has an innate control of time, speeding up the cooldowns of all nearby allies.

name: ice_shaman_incendiary_bomb
description: The Ice Shaman chucks a blue flame towards an enemy unit or building, dealing damage over time.

name: bounty_hunter_lookout
shard_description: Adds new ability: bounty_hunter_lookout.

name: brewmaster_primal_companion
description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves **1600** range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by **50%**. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a **100%** cooldown penalty. 

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for **3**s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for **70** seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.
lore: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Primal Companion.

name: brewmaster_fire_phase
description: Provides the Brewling with phased movement and bonus Status Resistance.

name: lina_flame_cloak
description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
lore: A natural defense equally suited to keeping anything from unwanted sisters to snarling hellbeasts at bay.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Flame Cloak.

name: chen_martyrdom
description: Sacrifice the life of this unit to heal an ally or damage an enemy with the current level of Hand of God.

name: special_bonus_unique_chen_12
localized_name: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

name: crystal_maiden_crystal_clone
description: Slides backward, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a **450** AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Crystal Clone.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE

name: tidehunter_arm_of_the_deep
description: Tidehunter unleashes a targeted slew of tentacles that damage and stun enemies within reach. The tentacles deal **50%** of Ravage's damage and stun, with a range **75%** of Ravage's radius.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Tendrils of the Deep.

name: special_bonus_unique_brewmaster_8
localized_name: +1x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler

name: special_bonus_unique_lina_8
localized_name: Spells deal %bonus_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

name: centaur_mount
description: Centaur tosses an ally into a cart hitched behind him. While in the cart, the ally can still cast and attack normally, but cannot move independently or be targeted by opponents. Non-targeted effects can still affect the hitched ally. Increases the attack range of melee heroes by **200**.
lore: The needs of Bradwarden's ample pride pale greatly in the face of his demand for victory.

name: enchantress_little_friends
description: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for **6** seconds.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Little Friends.

name: viper_nose_dive
description: Viper slams into the ground, disarming each enemy in a **500** AoE for **4** seconds and splattering everyone in a **1200** AoE with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
lore: It was thought that Netherdrake wings touch ground only in death, but some surmise that those who've witnessed more intentional landings merely haven't survived to tell the tale.
note: Cannot be used while Leashed or Rooted.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Nosedive.

name: venomancer_latent_poison
description: Applies a weak poison that minorly slows and deals damage to its target. If this poison is dispelled in any way, the target will receive a large amount of damage and be stunned.
lore: As Venomancer's own origins corroborate, some of Jidi's most horrifying dangers become apparent only with time.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Latent Toxicity.

name: spirit_breaker_planar_pocket
description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting the first targeted enemy hero spell in a radius towards him. Effect ends when the first spell is redirected.
lore: Barathrum's unyielding focus forms a pocket of planar convergence from which not even the most powerful arcane energies can escape.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Planar Pocket.

name: primal_beast_onslaught
description:
Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him. 

 Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.
lore: The Beast's single-minded focus on chosen prey leaves all other considerations scattered in his ruinous wake.

name: primal_beast_onslaught_release
description: Begins the rush to the specified location.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL

name: primal_beast_trample
description: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every **140** units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.
lore: As the only member of his species to arrive on this world, locals can only speculate on the Beast's size relative to his kin. Such observation would prove easier of course if the subject didn't eat everything it sees and destroy most of what it doesn't.

name: primal_beast_uproar
description:
The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of **50** damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar. 

 When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for **7** seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.
lore: Already draped in a broken patchwork of barding and chains upon appearing in the mistwoods, the Beast tolerates no further attempts at subjugation.
scepter_description: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases **3** waves of **2** projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

name: primal_beast_pulverize
description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Each consecutive hit deals bonus damage. Lasts **2.3** seconds.
lore: Though none are certain whether his utterances have true meaning, most concede the Beast's powerful grip and tendency to smash his enemies into naught but pulp and pieces communicates his intent well enough.

name: furion_curse_of_the_forest
description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within **1200** range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within **250** radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
lore: Though powerful, Nature's Prophet's gifts do not include all-sight, and he must rely heavily upon reconnaissance and aid from a long-standing network of stalwart friends.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Curse of the Oldgrowth.

name: shadow_demon_disseminate
description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within **675** range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

name: beastmaster_drums_of_slom
description:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and  healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of **0.4**s between hits after **20** attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10/15/20 attacks, based on the current level of Primal Roar.
lore: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Drums of Slom.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk_attack
description: Order all hawks to dive bomb the selected target

name: naga_siren_reel_in
description: CHANNELED - Naga Siren channels for up to **5** seconds, pulling all units affected by Naga's Ensnare in a **1400** range towards her at a speed of **200**.
lore: Even the youngest Slithereen are well schooled in trawling for prey with nothing but their wits and nets.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Reel In.

name: special_bonus_unique_dazzle_poison_touch_attack_range_bonus
description: +**300** Attack Range when attacking an enemy affected by Poison Touch

name: special_bonus_unique_magnus_reverse_polarity_stats
localized_name: +10 All Stats per hero hit with Reverse Polarity
description: Bonus Stats last for **15**s

name: special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_9
localized_name: +85% Breathe Fire Damage/Cast Range in Dragon Form

name: special_bonus_unique_medusa_7
localized_name: +15% Mystic Snake Turn and Movement Speed Slow

name: special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_hunter_status_resist
localized_name: +25% Hunter in the Night Status Resistance

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_refraction_disable_cast
localized_name: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled

name: special_bonus_unique_ursa_enrage_radius
localized_name: Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a 700 radius

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_plasmafield_second_ring
localized_name: Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s
description: The second plasma field does **30%** less damage

name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_dissimilate_outerring
description: Add a partial outer ring to Dissimilate

name: special_bonus_unique_silencer_glaives_bounces
description: Glaives of Wisdom Bounce to targets withing a **600** range.

name: special_bonus_unique_venomancer_gale_plagueward
description: When Venomous Gale impacts enemy Heroes, it creates **2** Plague Wards around them.

name: flagbearer_creep_aura_effect
description: The Flagbearer inspires all allies, granting them bonus health regeneration.

name: special_bonus_unique_drow_ranger_gust_invis
description: Does not reveal Wards

name: furion_hedgerow
description: Creates a row of hedges in front of Nature's Prophet that blocks incoming enemy attack projectiles. Slows and damages enemies that are too close to the Hedgerow.

name: nyx_assassin_jolt
description: Deals damages to the enemy equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence. Additionally deals damage equal to a percentage of damage the target received from Nyx in the past **15**s.

name: venomancer_noxious_plague
description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.

name: undying_tombstone_grab
description: Load an ally into the nearest available tombstone.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL

name: meepo_megameepo
description:
Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a **600** radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains **40%** of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

 When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: MegaMeepo.

name: zuus_lightning_hands
description: Zeus gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Lightning Hands.

name: special_bonus_unique_arc_warden_8
localized_name: No Damage Penalty Distance For Tempest Double

name: furion_arboreal_might
description: Nature's Prophet gains a stack of bonus attack damage for every **2** trees around him. Every attack reduces the stacks of attack damage, but increases Nature's Prophet's armor.

name: ogre_magi_dumb_luck
description: Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength. Increases Multicast chance by 1% for each 20 Strength Ogre has.

name: alchemist_corrosive_weaponry
description: Alchemist coats his weapons with an acid that applies a stacking slow and status resistance reduction to enemies hit. Slow and Status resistance increases when Alchemist is under the effect of Chemical Rage.

name: brewmaster_void_astral_pull
description: Pulls the target and the Void Brewling in the target direction. Enemies are damaged upon arrival.

name: clinkz_tar_bomb
description:
Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for **5** seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Burning Army Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

 When the Tar Bomb hits, any Burning Army skeletons within attack range will attack the target.

name: clinkz_strafe
description:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Burning Skeleton Archers skeletons within a **1200** radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and **50**/**55**/**60**/**65%** of the attack speed bonus. 

 Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.

name: drow_ranger_glacier
description: Drow Ranger creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow Ranger additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow Ranger. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast
shard_description: Adds new ability: Glacier.

name: magnus_strength_of_joelrak
description: Every time an enemy hero is damaged by an ability, Magnus gains a stacking buff, that provides **6** Strength per stack.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Strength of Joelrak.

name: special_bonus_unique_primal_beast_trample_unslowable
localized_name: Cannot be slowed or rooted during Trample

name: centaur_work_horse
description: Centaur hitches a cart behind him. While active, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede for the current level of Stampede, and can cast Hitch a Ride on a target ally.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Work Horse.

name: bounty_hunter_wind_walk_ally
description: Applies Shadow Walk and all of it's bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is **1**s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Friendly Shadow.

name: arc_warden_tempest_recall
description: Arc Warden takes the position of his Tempest on cast, destroying it in the process, and recovers Arc Warden for **50** of its remaining health and mana
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Tempest Recall.

name: special_bonus_unique_disruptor_consecutive_strike_damage
description: Every strike increases the damage of subsequent strikes until the debuff expires

name: antimage_counterspell_ally
description: Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead. Any time a spell is reflected by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Counterspell Ally.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_fetch
description: Grabs the Target Ally, Enemy or Rune, and uncontrollably drags them towards Lone Druid for the duration. Enemies receive damage every **0.5**s. When dragging a unit, they are Rooted and the Spirit Bear is slowed by **0%**.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Fetch.

name: special_bonus_unique_leshrac_pulse_nova_lightning
description: Lightning Storm hits a random enemy in Pulse Nova radius every **2**s with a single bolt. Prioritizes heroes.

name: techies_reactive_tazer_stop
description: Detonate Reactive Tazer immediately.

name: roshan_revengeroar
description: When facing the team that last killed him, Roshan will release an angry roar, heard everywhere on the map, that damages everyone in a **900** AoE and increases their incoming damage by **25%**

name: special_bonus_unique_lina_dragon_slave_crits
localized_name: +150% Crit On Targets Affected By Dragon Slave
description: Only applies to Lina's attacks

name: special_bonus_unique_ogre_magi_dumb_luck_mana
localized_name: +2/0.01 Dumb Luck Mana/Mana Regen Per Strength

name: special_bonus_unique_oracle_damage_per_purge
localized_name: Fortune's End Heals/Damages for 60 Per Effect Dispelled

name: special_bonus_unique_vengeful_spirit_wave_of_terror_steal
localized_name: Wave Of Terror Steals 20% Of Reduced Damage And Armor

name: warlock_imp_explode
description: Shortly after dying, a burst of magic damage based on the max health of the imp is dealt to all enemies in a small area. Does **50%** less damage to non-hero targets.

name: miniboss_unyielding_shield
description: Passively grants a regenerating All Damage Barrier. Armor can not go below 0.

name: miniboss_reflect
description: Reflects damage received evenly to the attacker and all other heroes within 1200 radius

name: tinker_keen_teleport
description: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

name: default_attack
description: Damage done by direct attacks.

name: attribute_bonus
description: Improves all attributes per point spent

name: antimage_mana_break

ability_special.header: MOVE SPEED SLOW ON FULL DRAIN:

description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
note: Mana Break has **50%** effect if caused by illusions.

name: antimage_blink
description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
note: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

name: antimage_spell_shield
description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
note: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

name: antimage_mana_void
description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
note: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.

name: axe_berserkers_call
description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him at high speed, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
scepter_description: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown.

name: axe_battle_hunger
description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
note: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
scepter_description: Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor and grants Axe armor per affected target.

name: axe_counter_helix
description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
note: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
shard_description: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown.

name: axe_culling_blade
description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
note: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.

name: bane_brain_sap
description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
shard_description: Reduces cooldown by **3**. Causes Brain Sap to become a **550** AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for **30%**.

name: bane_enfeeble
description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

name: bane_fiends_grip
description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every **0.5** seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
scepter_description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by **45**. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take **200%** incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

name: bane_nightmare
description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage nightmared targets freely with bonus attack speed.
lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
note:
In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.

name: bloodseeker_bloodrage
description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
note: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker or allies is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
shard_description: Bloodrage attacks now deal **30** pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

name: bloodseeker_blood_bath
description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After **2.9** seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
note: Total time is a **2.6** second delay plus a **0.3** second cast time.

name: bloodseeker_thirst
description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below **80%**, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below **25%**, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
note:
Not triggered by Illusions.
Max movement speed bonus occurs when an enemy's health is at or below **25%**.
Effects linger for **4** seconds if a target dies.

name: bloodseeker_rupture
description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

name: drow_ranger_frost_arrows
description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts **1.5** seconds.
lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
note: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
scepter_description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.

name: drow_ranger_silence
description: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
note: Doesn't stop usage of items.

name: drow_ranger_trueshot
description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

name: drow_ranger_marksmanship
description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility, with allies receiving **50%** of the bonus Drow receives. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within **400** range.
lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
note: Marksmanship procs have true strike.

name: earthshaker_fissure
description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
note:
Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
shard_description: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.

name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have **100** bonus attack range on the next attack.
lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
note: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
scepter_description: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.

name: earthshaker_aftershock
description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
note: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

name: earthshaker_echo_slam
description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

name: juggernaut_blade_dance
description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

name: juggernaut_blade_fury
description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Juggernaut deals damage in an interval equal to **2**x his attack speed 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
note:
You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
shard_description: Increases Blade Fury radius, and slows enemies by **35%**.

name: juggernaut_healing_ward
description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at **325** movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts **25** seconds.
lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
note:
The Healing Ward can be controlled.
Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.

name: juggernaut_omni_slash
description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
note: You can use items during Omnislash.

name: kunkka_torrent
description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
note:
The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

name: kunkka_tidebringer
description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot
description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
note: Interrupts channeling spells.

name: kunkka_return
description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

name: kunkka_ghostship
description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
note:
Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of **650**.

name: lina_dragon_slave
description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path and burns them over time.
lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
note: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

name: lina_light_strike_array
description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
note: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

name: lina_fiery_soul
description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts **18** seconds.
lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
note:
Duration refreshes each time an opponent is hit with a spell.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
shard_description: Lina's abilities deal **20** more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

name: lina_laguna_blade
description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage. Temporarily Supercharges Lina giving her **10** stacks of Fiery Soul.
lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
note: Laguna Blade has a **0.25** delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

name: lion_impale
description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
note: The spikes move at **2800** units per second.

name: lion_voodoo
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
note:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of **120**, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

name: lion_mana_drain
description: CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time, and dealing damage equal to **100%** of mana stolen. Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a **50%** rate.
lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
note: Instantly destroys illusions and prevents heroes from going invisible.
shard_description: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to **2** additional enemies and increases break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with **60%** magic resistance while channeling.

name: lion_finger_of_death
description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
note:
Finger of Death has a **0.25** delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within **3** seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.
scepter_description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

name: mirana_arrow
description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from **0.01** to **2.6**/**3.4**/**4.2**/**5** seconds, with bonus damage up to **150**/**160**/**170**/**180** added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
note:
For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
scepter_description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.

name: mirana_invis
description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
note: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.

name: mirana_leap
description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts **4** seconds.
lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
shard_description:
Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected and guarantees them to be hit with a secondary Starstorm if that spell is cast. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

 Can be put on alt-cast to choose the distance and facing direction of the jump. 

Grants **1** bonus charge(s).

name: mirana_starfall
description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a **650** radius will be struck a second time for **75%** of the damage.
lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
note:
Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

name: morphling_waveform
description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike_agi
description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. Passively grants bonus Agility. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a **3** second cooldown.
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
note: Projectile moves at **1150** speed.
shard_description: Increases bonus Agility.

name: morphling_morph_agi
description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
note:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.
shard_description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned.

name: morphling_morph_str
description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
note:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.
shard_description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned.

name: morphling_replicate
description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
note:
You can't target yourself with Morph.
Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.
scepter_description: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.

name: morphling_morph_replicate
description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

name: nevermore_shadowraze1
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

name: nevermore_shadowraze2
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

name: nevermore_shadowraze3
description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
note: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

name: nevermore_necromastery
description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases **30%** of them from bondage.
lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
note: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
scepter_description: Increases max souls.
shard_description: Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.

name: nevermore_dark_lord
description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies. Every enemy hero killed nearby further improves armor reduction by **2** for **20**s.
lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
note: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.

name: nevermore_requiem
description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for **0.7** seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of **2.15**. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. 

 Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
note:
One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every **1** soul in his possession.
Fear and movement slow do not apply if the Requiem was released on death.
scepter_description: Reduces cooldown and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

name: phantom_lancer_spirit_lance
description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
note: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
scepter_description: Spirit Lance bounces twice on enemies, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage.

name: phantom_lancer_doppelwalk
description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After **1** second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes **500%** bonus damage and deals **-80%** less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
note:
This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispel debuffs.
Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

name: phantom_lancer_juxtapose
description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for **8** seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last **4** seconds.
lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
note: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
shard_description: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to **8** seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by **15%** during this invisibility.

name: phantom_lancer_phantom_edge
description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
note:
If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
Rush movement speed is **800**.

name: puck_illusory_orb
description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
note:
The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

name: puck_ethereal_jaunt
description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

name: puck_waning_rift
description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

name: puck_phase_shift
description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
note:
Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
shard_description: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + **200** every time it phase shifts.

name: puck_dream_coil
description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
scepter_description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked based on Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.

name: pudge_flesh_heap
description: Gives Pudge damage block against all sources. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

name: pudge_meat_hook
description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
note:
Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Meat Hook hits invisible units.
Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, ancient units and Roshan.
Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
Meat Hook can hit and drag runes to Pudge, refunding the Hook's mana cost.

name: pudge_rot
description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
note:
Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.
Rot hits invisible units.
If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
Rot self-damage is non-lethal.
scepter_description: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.

name: pudge_dismember
description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of **75** units, up to a minimum of **125** range. Lasts longer on creeps.
lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
note: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
shard_description: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.

name: shadow_shaman_ether_shock
description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
note: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

name: shadow_shaman_voodoo
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities and amplifying the damage they receive.
lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
note:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of **100**, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

name: shadow_shaman_shackles
description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
shard_description: Shackles creates **4** Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by **75**. Serpent wards lasts **6** seconds.

name: shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward
description: Summons **10** Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
scepter_description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage.

name: razor_plasma_field
description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

name: razor_static_link
description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
note: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes **250** units greater than Static Link's cast range.
shard_description: Increases Cast Range. Allows Static Link to be put on alt-cast to pull Razor and his Target towards at each other at a speed of **100**.

name: razor_unstable_current
