description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed. There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

name: razor_eye_of_the_storm
description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
lore: Ride the lightning.
note:
Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
Successive casts of Eye of the Storm will stack.
scepter_description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

name: skeleton_king_hellfire_blast
description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target. Summoned skeletons around the target will receive bonus movement and attack speed for the duration of the debuff.
lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
note: If Wraith King has summoned skeletons, casting Wraithfire Blast on a target will order all of the skeletons to attack that target.

name: skeleton_king_vampiric_aura
description:
Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.

 Skeletons deal more damage to heroes and less damage to buildings.

Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by **40%**.
lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
note:
Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

name: skeleton_king_mortal_strike
description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
lore: One blow to crush a foe.

name: skeleton_king_reincarnation
description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a **900** radius will be slowed, and spawn **1**/**2**/**3** skeleton(s) to attack each nearby enemy hero. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.
lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
note:
Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
scepter_description: Reduces cooldown. If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed and gain bonus attack and movement speed. Heroes who die this way respawn at a faster rate.
shard_description: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and increases Skeleton Spawn count.

name: death_prophet_carrion_swarm
description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
note: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

name: death_prophet_silence
description: Fires a projectile that slows enemy units in a target area and prevents them from casting spells.
lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
note: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

name: death_prophet_exorcism
description:
Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts **40** seconds.
Passively grants Movement Speed.
lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
note:
Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
scepter_description: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.

name: sven_storm_bolt
description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
scepter_description: Increases cast range and applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If alt-cast, it deals an additional **180** damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.

name: sven_great_cleave
description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack. Passively grants bonus Strength.
lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

name: sven_warcry
description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts **10** seconds.
lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
shard_description: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants **6** armor and **3%** movement speed to all allies near Sven.

name: sven_gods_strength
description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for **35** seconds.
lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
note: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

name: storm_spirit_static_remnant
description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts **12** seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
note:
Remnants take **0.75** second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a **300** radius, but will only be triggered in **235**.

name: storm_spirit_electric_vortex
description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
scepter_description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

name: storm_spirit_overload
description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
note:
Using items doesn't trigger Overload.
Overload charges do not stack.
shard_description: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes **3** Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to **12** seconds or until the charges are depleted.

name: storm_spirit_ball_lightning
description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is **25**+**7.5%** of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is **10**+**0.65%** of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
lore: The Storm is coming in.
note:
Abilities and items can be used while traveling.
This ability will destroy trees.
Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

name: sandking_burrowstrike
description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit.
lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

name: sandking_sand_storm
description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The sandstorm follows Sand King at 100 units per second. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
note:
Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
Sand King briefly becomes visible upon attacking or using spells while in Sand Storm. Sand King will become invisible again in **0.7** seconds.
scepter_description: Every **0.2**s, **2** Burrowstrike spines are created at random locations, each measuring **10%** of the Sand Storm's current radius, that apply Burrowstrike damage and stun to enemies hit.

name: sandking_caustic_finale
description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

name: sandking_epicenter
description: After a cast point of **2** seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
note: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
shard_description: Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every **3.5**s causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

name: tiny_avalanche
description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does **2**x damage to units being tossed.
lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

name: tiny_toss
description: Grabs the nearest unit in a **300** radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
note:
You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
Debuff Immune units can be targeted but cannot be tossed.

name: tiny_tree_grab
description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
lore: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
note: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.
shard_description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

name: tiny_grow
description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

name: zuus_arc_lightning
description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.
lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

name: zuus_lightning_bolt
description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a **750** radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in **325** range. Deals **100%** more damage to creeps.
lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
note: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

name: zuus_static_field
description: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to **8%** of their current health.
lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

name: zuus_thundergods_wrath
description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Does a flat amount of damage and additional damage based on the max health of the target.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

name: slardar_sprint
description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.
lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
note: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.
scepter_description: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

name: slardar_slithereen_crush
description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
scepter_description: Increases Slithereen Crush puddle radius and duration.
shard_description: Increases Slithereen Crush radius, and causes it to apply Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.

name: slardar_bash
description: After **3** attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps. Passively grants bonus damage to Slardar while he's in water.
lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
note: Does not stack with Skull Basher.

name: slardar_amplify_damage
description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.
lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

name: tidehunter_gush
description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
scepter_description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

name: tidehunter_kraken_shell
description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
note:
Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards debuff removal.
The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for **7** seconds.
Kraken Shell removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

name: tidehunter_anchor_smash
description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
note: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.

name: tidehunter_ravage
description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
note:
Ravage will hit invisible units.
Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of **725**.

name: vengefulspirit_magic_missile
description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
shard_description: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within **75%** of Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.

name: vengefulspirit_command_aura
description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
scepter_description: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.

name: vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror
description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.
lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

name: vengefulspirit_nether_swap
description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.
lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
note:
Works on Spell Immune units.
Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.

name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova
description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
note: Crystal Nova provides vision in the targeted area for the duration.

name: crystal_maiden_frostbite
description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts **10** seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
note: Frostbite is considered a root.

name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura
description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a **1200** radius of Crystal Maiden receive **3**x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives **7**x the bonus.
lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts **10** seconds.
lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
note:
The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts **1** second).
Explosions occur every **0.1** seconds.
scepter_description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move **-75%** slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by **20%**. Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over **2.5**s.

name: windrunner_shackleshot
description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to **0.6**.
lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
note:
This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most **575** behind the target.
Shackleshot can be disjointed.

name: windrunner_powershot
description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to **1** second for a single powerful shot, which slows and deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow power is reduced.
lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
note: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

name: windrunner_windrun
description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.
lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
note: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
scepter_description: Windrun reduces physical damage taken by **-45%**, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.

name: windrunner_focusfire
description: Windranger channels the wind to gain **350**/**425**/**500** additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
note:
Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
Windranger can move while attacking.

name: lich_frost_nova
description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for **4** seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.
lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

name: lich_frost_armor
description: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts **40** seconds.
lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
note: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.

name: lich_frost_shield
description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every **1** seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.
note:
Spell-immune enemies are not affected by the damage or slow.
Frost Shield can be cast on buildings.

name: lich_chain_frost
description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to **10** times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
note:
Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.
Chain Frost has a movement speed of **850**.
Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.

name: witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask
description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals **150%** damage to creeps.
lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
note: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

name: witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration
description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
note:
Healing is done in **0.33** second intervals.
Can heal Spell Immune units.

name: witch_doctor_maledict
description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
note: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.

name: witch_doctor_death_ward
description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of **8** seconds. Death Ward has **50%** bonus accuracy.
lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
note:
The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
scepter_description: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

name: riki_smoke_screen
description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
note:
Can be cast during Tricks of the Trade.
Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
shard_description: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by **5** and cannot be targeted by their allies.

name: riki_blink_strike
description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
note:
Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

name: riki_backstab
description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. Bonus damage is doubled against non-hero units. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus experience for hero kills and assists.
lore: Riki comes for you.
note:
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Riki cannot Backstab buildings or Tormentors.

name: riki_tricks_of_the_trade
description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him. While phased out his attack damage is reduced, but his Agility greatly increases.
lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
note: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
scepter_description: Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.  Each attack hits an additional target.

name: enigma_malefice
description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every **2** seconds.
lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
shard_description: Increases Malefice stun duration by 0.35s and creates an Eidolon next to the target every instance of Malefice stun. These Eidolons will not multiply further.

name: enigma_demonic_conversion
description: Summons three fragments of Enigma himself at the cost of health.  The eidolons health is increased by **4%** of Enigma's current health. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

name: enigma_midnight_pulse
description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing **5**/**10**/**15**/**20** + a percentage of the enemies current HP as damage.
lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
note:
This ability destroys trees in its area.
Multiple instances of Midnight Pulse do not stack.

name: enigma_black_hole
description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
scepter_description: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to **3.5%** of the unit's Max Health per second and does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a **1200** AoE. Pulls at a rate of **175**.

name: tinker_laser
description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
scepter_description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +**200** cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by **10%** (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to **700** range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile
description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within **1500** range.
lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

name: tinker_march_of_the_machines
description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
note: Robots spawn at a rate of **24** per second.
shard_description: Adds new ability: March of the Machines.

name: tinker_rearm
description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities and grants bonus magic resistance for **4** seconds.
lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
note: Rearm works on all items except Aeon Disk, Arcane Boots, Black King Bar, Hand of Midas, Helm of the Dominator, Helm of the Overlord, Linken's Sphere, Meteor Hammer, Pipe of Insight, Refresher Orb, Revenant's Brooch (passive ability), and all neutral items.

name: sniper_shrapnel
description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every **35** seconds.
lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
note:
Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.
Does not damage buildings.
Provides vision in the targeted area.

name: sniper_headshot
description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by **-100%**.
lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
note: Works on allied creeps.

name: sniper_take_aim
description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide **100%** Headshot chance and an additional **200** attack range bonus. Slows you by **45**/**40**/**35**/**30%** for the duration.
lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

name: sniper_assassinate
description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals Sniper's attack damage plus bonus damage at long range and mini-stuns the target. Whenever Sniper kills an enemy hero, Assassinate is refreshed.
lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
note:
Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.
Invisibility doesn't disjoint the projectile.
scepter_description: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and stun the enemy target.

name: necrolyte_death_pulse
description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
note: Death Pulse can't be disjointed.

name: necrolyte_heartstopper_aura
description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for **7** seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
note:
Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.
Does not affect ancient creeps.
scepter_description: Heartstopper Aura's Health Decay is increased by **50%** of Necrophos's current health regeneration.

name: necrolyte_sadist
description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.

name: necrolyte_reapers_scythe
description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
note: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.

name: warlock_fatal_bonds
description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others. Summons an imp from the corpse of any unit that dies while under the effects of Fatal Bonds that lasts for **15** seconds and explodes on death. Imps will automatically seek out nearby units, favoring fatally bonded heroes, and will explode when reaching their prey.
lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
note: The shared damage type is the same as the type of damage inflicted.
shard_description: Increases the power of all imps summoned by Warlock.

name: warlock_shadow_word
description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

name: warlock_upheaval
description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to **10**/**12**/**14**/**16** seconds. Enemies are slowed for **3** seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
note: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.
shard_description: While channeling, Warlock spawns an imp every **2** seconds that lasts for **15** seconds and explode dealing damage to all enemies around them upon death.

name: warlock_rain_of_chaos
description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for **0.8** seconds. The Golem lives **60** seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has increased Slow Resistance, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
note: This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
scepter_description: Calls **2** Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

name: warlock_golem_flaming_fists
description: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.

name: warlock_golem_permanent_immolation
description: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, with damage per second.

name: beastmaster_wild_axes
description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
note: This ability destroys trees.

name: beastmaster_hawk_invisibility
description: If motionless for some time, the hawk becomes invisible.

name: beastmaster_boar_poison
description: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.

name: beastmaster_inner_beast
description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

name: queenofpain_shadow_strike
description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for **15** seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every **3** seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.
lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
note:
The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
scepter_description: Causes Shadow Strike to become a **375** AoE Spell, and have increased initial damage. When Shadow Strike ends or is re-applied to an enemy Hero, the target emits a Scream of Pain, hitting any nearby enemies.

name: queenofpain_blink
description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
note: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
shard_description: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals **125** damage in a **300** AoE and silences the target for **1.75** seconds.

name: queenofpain_scream_of_pain
description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
note:
Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

name: queenofpain_sonic_wave
description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
note: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.

name: beastmaster_primal_roar
description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain **40%** movement speed for 3 seconds.
lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

name: venomancer_venomous_gale
description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
note:
Venomous Gale can be lethal. Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
Duration damage is dealt every **3** seconds.
Slow starts at **-50%**, and decreases as time passes.

name: venomancer_poison_sting
description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
note:
Poison Sting damage can be lethal.
Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.

name: venomancer_plague_ward
description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

name: venomancer_poison_nova
description: Whenever Venomancer dies or the effects of Venomous Gale end prematurely on an enemy hero, a spreading ring of poison erupts. Enemies hit by the poison will take non-lethal magic damage over time and have their magic resistance reduced. This effect can trigger every **10** seconds and cannot be refreshed.
lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Poison Nova.

name: faceless_void_time_walk
description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last **2** seconds.
lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
note: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.
scepter_description: Applies a Time Lock to all units at the landing destination.
shard_description: Increases range

name: faceless_void_time_lock
description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
note: Does not stack with Skull Basher.

name: faceless_void_chronosphere
description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  All ability and item cooldowns are frozen. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
note:
Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.
Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.

name: pugna_nether_blast
description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals **65%** damage to structures.
lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
note: Damage is delayed by **0.8** seconds.

name: pugna_decrepify
description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead. Can be cast while channeling.
lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
note:
Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.
Doesn't slow allied units.
Can be used on your Nether Ward.

name: pugna_nether_ward
description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.
lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
note:
Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.
Nether Ward can be decrepified.
Illusions and creeps deal 25% damage to Nether Ward.
shard_description: Increases cast range.

name: pugna_life_drain
description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
note: Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
scepter_description: Reduces cooldown by **7**s. When targeting an enemy hero, Pugna reduces their outgoing spell damage by **8%** per second up to a maximum of **75%** and increases his own, up to a maximum of **100%**. When draining through a Nether Ward using Shard, the rate of increase/decrease is **4%** instead. Debuff lasts **8** seconds.
shard_description: Life Drain can target your Nether Ward, causing life drain to refract to all enemy heroes within **700** units of the ward for **75%** of its normal value. The effect is interrupted if the ward is destroyed.

name: phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger
description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing **65**/**70**/**75**/**80**+**30%**/**45%**/**60%**/**75%** of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
note:
If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.
Spell-immune enemies are not affected by Stifling Dagger's slow.
Stifling Dagger grants vision around its location while it travels and upon impact.

name: phantom_assassin_phantom_strike
description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.

name: phantom_assassin_blur
description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes, towers, or outposts.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
note: Attacking Roshan with a regular attack will dispel Blur.
scepter_description: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Any time Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces cooldown.

name: phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace
description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, acquiring a chance of gaining Deadly Focus with each attack. When attacking with Deadly Focus, Phantom Assassin will consume the buff and guarantee a critical hit. Stifling Dagger has a bonus chance to cause Deadly Focus.
lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.

name: templar_assassin_refraction
description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
note:
Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).
Only instances of **5** or more damage will trigger Refraction.
Refraction is visible to enemies.

name: templar_assassin_meld
description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for **12** seconds.
lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
note:
Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position or channeling Psionic Projection.
Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.

name: templar_assassin_psi_blades
description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.
lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
note:
Split damage hits invisible units.
Attack effects like Bash will only be applied to the main target.

name: templar_assassin_psionic_trap
description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they deal a small amount of damage and exert a slowing influence of **30%** in the area. Traps charge up to slow **60%** after **3.5** seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
note:
Traps last indefinitely.
They have invisibility that fades in over **2** seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.
Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.
shard_description: Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.

name: templar_assassin_trap
description:
Springs the trap nearest to Templar Assassin, slowing nearby enemies. 

If the ability is in alt-cast state, springs the trap that is closest to the mouse cursor.

name: templar_assassin_self_trap
description: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.

name: necronomicon_warrior_last_will
description: Deals damage to the unit that kills the Necronomicon Warrior.

name: necronomicon_warrior_sight
description: Reveals invisible units.

name: necronomicon_warrior_mana_burn
description: Mana burned per hit, a portion of which is dealt as damage.

name: necronomicon_archer_mana_burn
description: Launches an arrow that burns away the targeted unit's mana, dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.

name: necronomicon_archer_aoe
description: Increases movement of nearby units.

name: courier_return_to_base
description: Returns the courier to base

name: courier_transfer_items
description: Transfer items to hero

name: courier_return_stash_items
description: Return items to stash

name: courier_take_stash_items
description: Retrieve items from stash

name: courier_shield
description: Summons a protective shield around the courier

name: courier_burst
description: The courier gains a burst of speed for **6** seconds

name: roshan_spell_block
description: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds. Also reduces status effects by 25%.

name: roshan_bash
description: Roshan has a chance to stun on attack.

name: roshan_slam
description: Roshan slams the ground, damaging and slowing all nearby enemies. Slam's damage will increase every minute.

name: roshan_devotion
description: Roshan possesses numerous protective abilities, including 55% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and a scaling armor bonus that increases as time goes on.

name: viper_poison_attack
description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to **5** times.
lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
shard_description: Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.

name: viper_nethertoxin
description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Units in it have their attack speed slowed.
lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

name: viper_corrosive_skin
description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a **1200** radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
note: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.
scepter_description: Corrosive Skin applies **2**x the damage and attack speed slow to enemies that are within **500** distance of Viper.

name: viper_viper_strike
description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also disabling their passives and dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.

name: luna_lucent_beam
description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.

name: luna_moon_glaive
description: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
note: Moon Glaives do not proc any attack modifier except Critical Strikes.
shard_description: Moon Glaives can be activated to create **4** glaives that rotate in a **175** radius around Luna for **7** seconds, reducing damage she takes by **25%**. Any unit that collides with a glaive will take **75%** of Luna's Attack Damage.

name: luna_lunar_blessing
description: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes, with Luna receiving **200%** of the attack damage bonus allies receive. At night Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with increased vision range.
lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

name: luna_eclipse
description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.
lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
note:
Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.
Beams will stop if Luna is killed.
Will not hit invisible units.
There is a **0.6** seconds gap between beams, **0.3** seconds with scepter.
scepter_description: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams, reduces duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

name: dragon_knight_breathe_fire
description:
Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

Applies the debuff from Corrosive Breath and Frost Breath Dragon Form is of the corresponding level.
lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.

name: dragon_knight_dragon_tail
description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing damage based on their enemy max HP.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to **450**.
lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

name: dragon_knight_dragon_blood
description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.

name: dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form
description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal **25**/**25**/**25**/**35** poison damage per second for **5** seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a **350** radius for **75**/**75**/**75**/**100%** damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by **0**/**0**/**-30**/**-45%** and attack speed by **0**/**0**/**-30**/**-45** of enemy units in Splash Attack range for **0**/**0**/**3**/**3** seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
note:
Corrosive Breath poison damage is lethal.
Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Dragon Knight was in when the item was used.
scepter_description: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, 25% increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.

name: dazzle_poison_touch
description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.
lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
note:
The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
Units afflicted by Poison Touch can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
shard_description: Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for **1.6** seconds.

name: dazzle_shallow_grave
description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.
lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
note: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.

name: dazzle_shadow_wave
description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
note:
Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps.
If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they will take multiple instances of damage.
scepter_description: Shadow Wave can now target and bounce between enemies in addition to allies. When bouncing to an enemy, they will take damage and heal nearby allies equal to **150%** of the normal healing and damage values. Dazzle will also perform an attack against any enemy that Shadow Wave bounces to.

name: dazzle_weave
description: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.
lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
note: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.

name: rattletrap_battery_assault
description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps.
lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
note: Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.

name: rattletrap_power_cogs
description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Allies in the cogs when they are created receive a magic damage barrier. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
note: Cogs can shock invisible units.

name: rattletrap_rocket_flare
description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area. Upon impact, enemies in the area take damage and are briefly slowed. Rocket flare provides vision over the impact area for **6** seconds.
lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.

name: rattletrap_hookshot
description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a **175** radius around the hit target.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
note: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.

name: leshrac_split_earth
description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
note:
Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
There is a **0.35** second delay before the effect is applied.
shard_description: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location **3** additional times, with a **5** second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by **45**. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

name: leshrac_diabolic_edict
description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts **10** seconds.
lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
note:
The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.

name: leshrac_lightning_storm
description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies have their move speed and attack speed slowed.
lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.

name: leshrac_pulse_nova
description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.
lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.

name: furion_sprout
description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, damaging and trapping it in place and providing vision in a **250** radius.
lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
note:
Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
A Tango that consumes a tree created by Sprout provides the standard healing effects.

name: furion_teleportation
description: Teleports to any point on the map. After teleporting, Nature's Prophet gains stacks of bonus attack damage. Every attack consumes a stack of bonus damage to increase Nature Prophet's armor.
lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
note:
Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

name: furion_force_of_nature
description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
note: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.

name: furion_wrath_of_nature
description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.
lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
note:
Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
scepter_description: Lowers cooldown by **25**s. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from **2**s up to **3.8**s seconds at max bounce.

name: life_stealer_rage
description:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Debuff Immune, increasing magic resistance by 80%, and gaining increased movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
note: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.

name: life_stealer_feast
description: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.
lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
note:
Does not affect Roshan.
The heal is independent of the damage.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

name: life_stealer_open_wounds
description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving **500** damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within **700** radius.
lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
note:
Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 50% / 50% / 40% / 30% / 20% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Open Wounds.

name: life_stealer_infest
description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
note:
Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
Creeps that are controlled while Infested gain Infest's movement speed bonus.
Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.
scepter_description: Increases cast range and reduces cooldown to **20**s.  Infest may target enemy heroes for a short duration, disarming them and attacking them from the inside while increasing Lifestealer's regeneration rate.

name: life_stealer_consume
description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

name: dark_seer_vacuum
description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
note:
This ability interrupts channeling.
Pulls units over **0.3**/**0.4**/**0.5**/**0.6** seconds before dealing damage.
Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.

name: dark_seer_ion_shell
description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
note:
Deals small amounts of damage in **0.2** second intervals.
Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.
If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.

name: dark_seer_surge
description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of phased movement speed. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
note: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.
shard_description: Surged units leave behind a **150** radius trail that lasts **7**s, slows enemies around it by **-50%** and deals **35** damage per second in **0.5**s intervals. Can be put on alt-cast to disable the trail.

name: dark_seer_wall_of_replica
description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows, damages, and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
note:
Doesn't create illusions from other illusions.
There cannot be more than one illusion per player per wall.
Wall of Replica will not slow spell-immune enemies.

name: clinkz_burning_barrage
description: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers, and dousing enemies with Tar Bomb slow.
lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
note: Bonus Attack Range increases the length of Burning Barrage.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Burning Barrage.

name: clinkz_searing_arrows
description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
note:
Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.
The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.

name: clinkz_wind_walk
description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. Leaving Skeleton Walk creates Burning Skeleton Archers
lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
note: Has a fadetime of **0.6** seconds.

name: clinkz_death_pact
description:
Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly skeleton and creates a Burning Skeleton Archer in their place, healing and gaining max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk. 

Archers are immobile and die within several attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range. Only one archer can be summoned from Death Pact at a time.

 Skeletons deal **25%** less damage to buildings
lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
note:
If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.
Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.
When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.
scepter_description: Increases Skeleton Archer Hits to Kill.

name: omniknight_purification
description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.

name: omniknight_repel
description:
Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them increased Status Resistance, Strength and Health Regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

name: omniknight_degen_aura
description: Greatly degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
note: Does not affect Debuff Immune units.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Degen Aura.

name: omniknight_guardian_angel
description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants a target ally immunity from physical damage.
lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
scepter_description: Grants one extra charge and global cast range. Always casts a Guardian Angel on self as well as the selected target

name: enchantress_untouchable
description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
note:
All units who directly attack Enchantress will get slowed.
The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.

name: enchantress_enchant
description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed and damaged for **5**s.

 If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health. Enchantress can control up to **1** creeps at a time for up to **30**/**60**/**90**/**120**s. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
note: Illusions can be converted.
scepter_description: Enchantress can control multiple creeps at a time.

name: enchantress_natures_attendants
description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts **9**/**10**/**11**/**12** seconds.
lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
note: Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.

name: enchantress_impetus
description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
note:
The damage is capped at **1750** distance.
Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.

name: huskar_inner_vitality
description: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster.  Lasts **16** seconds.
lore: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
note:
The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.
Can be cast on Spell Immune units.

name: huskar_burning_spear
description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.
lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
note:
Burning Spear stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap.
Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.

name: huskar_berserkers_blood
description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
note: Bonuses are provided linearly, no bonus at Full HP and full bonus at strictly less than **10%** HP.

name: huskar_life_break
description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health and slow both their movement and attack speed.  While leaping, Huskar is Debuff Immune and has 50% increases magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
note:
If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.
Slow works on Spell Immune units.
Life Break cannot be disjointed.
scepter_description: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.

name: night_stalker_void
description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and the slowing effect lasts longer.
lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
note: Void does not ministun enemies during the day.
scepter_description: Void becomes an area of effect ability. Increases the mini-stun duration and leaves behind a void zone. While in the zone, all of Night Stalker's abilities are empowered with their night time effect.

name: night_stalker_crippling_fear
description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced and take damage over time while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.
lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.

name: night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night
description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
shard_description: Hunter in the Night may be cast on a creep, instantly killing it and restoring some of Night Stalker's maximum health and mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime.

name: night_stalker_darkness
description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Refreshes the cooldown of all non-ultimate abilities when cast. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.
lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.

name: broodmother_spawn_spiderlings
description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
note:
If the target is killed within **20** seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.
Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.

name: broodmother_spin_web
description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, increases her Turn Rate, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every **27** seconds, with a max of **4**/**6**/**8**/**10** charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP
lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of foreboding.
note:
Also affects Spiderling and Spiderites.
Grants full movement speed bonus at 100% HP, 0% movement speed bonus at 1HP

name: broodmother_incapacitating_bite
description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
