localized_name: +1 Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

name: special_bonus_unique_bane_4
description: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.

name: special_bonus_unique_morphling_4
description: Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.

name: special_bonus_unique_puck_3
description: Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every %value% seconds.

name: special_bonus_unique_razor_3
localized_name: Static Link Steals 1 Armor per Second

name: special_bonus_unique_riki_5
localized_name: Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel
description: Can be cast when rooted or leashed

name: special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4
localized_name: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
description: Every **500** distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.

name: special_bonus_unique_wisp_5
description: While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.

name: tiny_toss_tree
description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.
shard_description: Increases damage dealt by thrown trees by **100**.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_4
description: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.

name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_5
description: Enemies hit by the spill of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by **100%** for **1** second.

name: special_bonus_unique_tidehunter_4
localized_name: +4 Kraken Shell Damage Block per Anchor Smash Kill
description: Retroactively counts any hero who died with Anchor Smash debuff.

name: special_bonus_unique_timbersaw_2
localized_name: +6 Max / +1 Hero Attack Reactive Armor Stacks

name: special_bonus_unique_troll_warlord_4
description: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.

name: special_bonus_unique_tusk_4
description: Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.

name: special_bonus_unique_oracle_4
description: The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).

name: special_bonus_unique_venomancer_5
localized_name: Noxious Plague Aura reduces 200 Attack Speed

name: special_bonus_unique_winter_wyvern_4
description: The slow is still applied for the same duration.

name: morphling_adaptive_strike_str
description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. Passively grants bonus Strength. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a **3** second cooldown.
lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
note: Projectile moves at **1150** speed.
shard_description: Increases bonus Strength.

name: special_bonus_unique_faceless_void_4
description: Grants a **20%** chance to avoid damage entirely. Disabled by break.

name: special_bonus_unique_tiny_5
description: Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.

name: special_bonus_unique_monkey_king_6
description: Creates an additional ring of **7** soldiers at **1100** range from the center.

name: special_bonus_unique_dark_seer_4
description: A second Wall of Replica is created **600** units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.

name: special_bonus_unique_shadow_demon_6
localized_name: Soul Catcher Creates 2 Illusion On Death

name: special_bonus_unique_meepo_4
localized_name: Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

name: visage_stone_form_self_cast
description: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After **6** seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
note: While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispels.

name: special_bonus_unique_huskar_5
description: Pierces Spell Immunity.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar
description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk
description: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every **4**s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
shard_description: Reduces Hawk cooldown by **10**s and summons an additional Hawk.

name: grimstroke_return
description: Triggers an existing Ink Swell.

name: huskar_inner_fire
description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
lore: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.
shard_description: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies.

name: spirit_breaker_bulldoze
description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
lore: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

name: dazzle_bad_juju
description:
Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.
  The spell can be activated by spending health to decrease the remaining cooldown of all other abilities. Casting Bad Juju temporarily increases its health cost.
lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

name: chen_divine_favor
description:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing they receive.

If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes or their units will cancel the teleport.
lore: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

name: pangolier_lucky_shot
description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to drastically slow their attack speed and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.
lore: The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.

name: lone_druid_spirit_bear_defender
description: Spirit Bear absorbs **30%** of the damage dealt to Lone Druid.

name: lone_druid_spirit_link
description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
lore: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.
scepter_description:
Lone Druid severs his link to his Spirit Bear, and connects to the target allied hero, sharing the Spirit Link bonuses with them for **20**s. Armor sharing and attack speed are increased by **35%**. Damage done by the ally heals Lone Druid, as well as the other way around.

 The Spirit Bear is feared for the duration of the transformation, unless he has his own Aghanim's Scepter.

name: brewmaster_cinder_brew
description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignite once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by **3** seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger. Dealing or receiving magic damage extends Brewmaster's Brewed Up duration.
lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

name: lich_dark_sorcery
description: Grants you bonus attack speed for a limited number of attacks, draining a percentage of mana for each hit. Costs a percentage of current health to cast. Lasts up to **15** seconds or when the attack count is consumed.

name: lich_frost_aura
description: Allied Aura. Causes all nearby ally attacks to slow enemy movement speed.

name: antimage_counterspell
description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

name: keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp
description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
lore: Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.
note: Ignus Fatuus applies a non-interrupting pull towards it on all enemies within the radius.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Will-O-Wisp.

name: meepo_ransack
description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
lore: So you gonna need that, or...?

name: clinkz_burning_army
description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.
lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Burning Army.

name: rubick_arcane_supremacy
description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.
lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

name: tusk_tag_team
description: Passively slows the attack speed of all enemies within **350** radius. Activate to temporarily apply a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts **5** seconds.
lore: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.
note: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

name: omniknight_pacify
description: Causes affected enemies to deal less spell damage for a duration.
lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

name: lich_sinister_gaze
description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana. If cast on a creep lasts **2**x longer and deals **250** damage per second.
lore: Mind the cold...
scepter_description: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of **400** in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.

name: ancient_apparition_ice_age
description: Causes all enemy heroes in a **800** radius to take **25** damage per second and -**100%** Health/Lifesteal Regeneration for **5** seconds.
lore: Ice Age Lore
shard_description: Adds new ability: Ice Age.

name: void_spirit_aether_remnant
description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.
shard_description: Increases Aether Remnant watch range and only pulls enemy hero units. Other units take **30%** damage every **1**s that they are in the remnant's path, but the remnant is not destroyed. Decreases cooldown to **15**/**13**/**11**/**9**s.

name: void_spirit_astral_step
description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for **1.25** seconds and then detonates.
lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
note: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.

name: void_spirit_resonant_pulse
description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a physical attack damage barrier and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The barrier gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits. The barrier only protects against attacks.
lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.
scepter_description: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain **2** charges.

name: special_bonus_unique_void_spirit_8
description: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.

name: primal_beast_rock_throw
description:
Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the rock splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

 Rock Throw increases stacks of Uproar for each hero hit.
lore: AGAIN WITH THE ROCKS!
shard_description: Adds new ability: Rock Throw.

name: special_bonus_unique_primal_beast_roar_dispells
localized_name: Beast dispels himself when activating Uproar

name: seasonal_throw_snowball
description: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
lore: Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.

name: seasonal_summon_snowman
description: Construct a jolly snowman.
lore: He'll stay friends as long as he can.

name: seasonal_decorate_tree
description: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
lore: Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.

name: seasonal_festive_firework
description: Shoot a firework into the air.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: frostivus2018_throw_snowball
description:
Throw a snowball at an enemy, damaging and stunning all enemy units around it.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: Enjoy a bold, rocky center with a packed-ice crust!

name: frostivus2018_summon_snowman
description:
Summons a snowman that taunts nearby enemies.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: He's irresistibly friendly!

name: frostivus2018_decorate_tree
description:
Decorate a tree with blinking lights that damage nearby enemies.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: Who knew a few twinkling lights could be so deadly?

name: seasonal_summon_penguin
description: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
lore: Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
note: Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.

name: frostivus2018_festive_firework
description:
Fires a global range firework that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies, blinding them, and providing vision for 10 seconds.

Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

name: seasonal_summon_ti9_balloon
description: No one can resist the sky snake's goofy charms.

name: seasonal_ti9_banner
description: Plant your personal battle standard to mark this battleground as yours!

name: seasonal_ti9_shovel

name: seasonal_ti9_monkey
description: He'll fling filth at your enemies so you don't have to.

name: invoker_cold_snap_ad
description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases as the level goes up.
lore: Sadron's Protracted Frisson.
note: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than **10** after reductions.

name: invoker_ghost_walk_ad
description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies, and slows Invoker as well based on the level.
lore: Myrault's Hinder-Gast.
note: The slow effect does not work on Debuff Immune enemies.

name: invoker_tornado_ad
description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level and holds enemies in the air for a duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Claws of Tornarus.
note: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

name: invoker_emp_ad
description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after **2.9** seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
lore: Endoleon's Malevolent Perturbation.
note: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).
shard_description: Increases damage for each point of mana drained by EMP and pulls enemy units into the EMP's center at **175** units per second.

name: invoker_alacrity_ad
description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed and their damage.
lore: Gaster's Mandate of Impetuous Strife.

name: invoker_sun_strike_ad
description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
lore: Harlek's Incantation of Incineration.
note:
Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.
scepter_description: Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a **100** second cooldown. Creates **2** visible Sun Strikes within **160**-**200** range of each enemy hero.

name: invoker_forge_spirit_ad
description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.
lore: Culween's Most Cunning Fabrications.
note: Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

name: invoker_chaos_meteor_ad
description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage and rolling further based on the level. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time.
lore: Tarak's Descent of Fire.
note:
Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every **0.5** seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over **3** seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of **300**.

name: invoker_ice_wall_ad
description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies and deals damage each second.
lore: Killing Wall of Koryx.
note: The slow will still affect Debuff Immune enemies if their debuff immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.

name: invoker_deafening_blast_ad
description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration then disarm their attacks for a duration.
lore: Buluphont's Aureal Incapacitator.

name: tiny_tree_channel
description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Tree Volley.

name: spectre_haunt_single
description:
Creates a spectral nemesis to haunt a single visible enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places with any haunting illusion.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.
lore: With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.

name: grimstroke_dark_portrait
description: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is debuff immune, has 95% magic resistance, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
lore: No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Dark Portrait.

name: templar_assassin_trap_teleport
description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for **1.5** seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing **200** bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Psionic Projection.

name: clinkz_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: .

name: slardar_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: .

name: troll_warlord_scepter
scepter_description: Adds new ability: .

name: dawnbreaker_fire_wreath
description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
lore: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.
note:
Dawnbreaker travels at a rate of **215** for the duration of the ability and takes a brief **0.2**s to recover after the final strike.
Celestial Hammer or Solar Guardian cannot be cast during the combo.
Cleave does not work with this ability.
Can be self-cast to move forward
shard_description: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by **25%** down to a minimum of **215**.

name: dawnbreaker_converge
description: Dawnbreaker recalls her hammer, pulling them together so they meet in the middle.

name: dawnbreaker_solar_guardian
description: CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within **350** units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
lore: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.
note:
Pulse interval is **0.5**s.
Total duration flight duration is **1.7** seconds of channel time + **0.8** of flight time.
Cannot be cast without the Hammer.
Healing does not affect Dawnbreaker herself.
scepter_description: Reduces the channel time and increases the healing and total duration of Solar Guardian's air time. Causes allies in the destination area to have evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne. Solar Guardian can be cast again after take off to land early. While airborne, the landing point of Solar Guardian can be moved at a speed of **200**.

name: dawnbreaker_celestial_hammer
description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for **2** seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
lore: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.
note:
The hammer damages enemies both when thrown and when returning to Dawnbreaker.
Dawnbreaker's Converge movement distance is capped at the ability's cast range.
Starbreaker or Solar Guardian cannot be cast while the Hammer is out.

name: dawnbreaker_luminosity
description: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within **650** units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for **50%** of the amount.
lore: Diminished in power without access to the Children's replenishing light, Valora can still recharge herself and her allies by creating order from the chaos which resides within each fight.
note: Luminosity Heal is considered a lifesteal and increased by sources of Lifesteal Amplification.

name: high_five
description: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!

name: special_bonus_unique_tidehunter_8
localized_name: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

name: grimstroke_dark_artistry
description: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
lore: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

name: grimstroke_ink_creature
description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
note:
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or spell immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

name: grimstroke_spirit_walk
description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After **5** seconds, or when manually triggered, it applies damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
lore: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
shard_description:
Causes Ink Swell to deal **30%** more damage and heal the target for **30%** of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: special_bonus_unique_phantom_assassin_8
localized_name: +700 Range and Ground Target Stifling Dagger
description: Allows using Blink Strike on the Dagger. Grants 800 vision. Lasts up to 2 minutes.

name: pangolier_rollup
description: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Roll Up.

name: lich_ice_spire
description:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 5 hero hits or 10 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Ice Spire.

name: pangolier_rollup_stop
description: Ends Pangolier's Roll Up early.

name: faceless_void_time_walk_reverse
description: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Reverse Time Walk.

name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field_stop
description: Immediately stops the Freezing Field

name: plus_high_five
description: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!

name: plus_guild_banner
description: Plant your guild's banner to mark this battleground for you all!

name: dawnbreaker_land
description: Can be cast to land Dawnbreaker into the target area at any time.

name: hoodwink_sharpshooter
description:
Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage, break and slow to an enemy Hero.  The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after **3** seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after **5** seconds.
Hoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of **350** from the force of the shot. Creeps hit by the bolt are damaged for half the values.
lore: While her first arbalest was a chance discovery, Hoodwink now takes great care in carving and caring for her own -- of course with some necessary components pilfered or otherwise cleverly procured.
scepter_description: Decreases wind-up time and increases arrow speed.

name: hoodwink_decoy
description: Hoodwink turns invisible, increasing her movement speed, and creates a decoy illusion that starts aiming a decreased damage Sharpshooter at the nearest enemy hero. If the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and it throws a lesser bushwhack towards the enemy.
scepter_description: Adds new ability: Decoy.

name: hoodwink_bushwhack
description: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemies if they are near a tree in the area.  Affected enemies take damage over time and are pulled towards the tree nearest to them within the target area, and have their vision reduced to 0 for the duration of the stun.
lore: Hoodwink favors Ironwood groves for ambushes, but the wary step carefully in all areas of the mistwoods.
note:
Units can be freed from the stun by destroying the tree.
Bushwhack does not hit invisible units.

name: hoodwink_sharpshooter_release
description: Release the charged up shot, regain ability to move and attack.
lore: Fire!

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK

name: marci_grapple
description: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.
lore: Marci excels at removing obstacles from Princess Mirana's path.

name: marci_unleash
description:
Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes that slow movement and attack speed of the target for **2**s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for **1.5**s.

Marci gains **15%** movement speed when Unleash is cast.
lore: Though some have sought to understand its origins, Marci rebuffs all attempts to divine the source of her power.
note:
Once a Fury combo is started, each attack must be delivered within 1s or the Fury combo expires.
Removes attack speed limit.
scepter_description:
Reduces Unleash cooldown by **10** seconds and causes Unleash to apply a basic dispel on Marci. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast. All of Marci's unleash pulses will silence units for **1** seconds.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: necronomicon_archer_purge
description:
Dispels positive buffs from enemies and slows their movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
note:
Can be cast on invulnerable units.
The slow starts at 100% and decreases over time to 20%.

name: marci_guardian
description: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with shared lifesteal and attack damage. If Marci and her ally are further apart from each other than **2500**, the ally receives no bonuses and Marci only gets **50%** until they get close again. Marci's lifesteal also heals her ally and the ally lifesteal also heals Marci.
lore: Marci learned at a young age that the best asset in a scrap is a steady companion.
note:
Marci cannot cast Sidekick on herself.
Lifesteal effectiveness gets a **40%** penalty against creeps.

name: marci_companion_run
description:
Marci bounds to the targeted allied unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies where she lands.

 The ally receives **25**/**30**/**35**/**40%** bonus movement speed for **5**s.
lore: With a friendly or brazen boost, Marci can find her way into the midst of any fight.
note:
Has **150** minimum jump distance.
Marci's initial run to her target unit can be disjointed.
shard_description: Decreases the cooldown of Rebound, it can be cast on enemies, and causes Marci to also get the speed boost when she casts it.

name: special_bonus_unique_marci_guardian_magic_immune
description: Also grants 50% magic resistance.

name: special_bonus_unique_abaddon_immolation
description: Affects Abaddon and all enemies in a **400** AoE.

name: undying_tombstone_unit_grab
description: Load an ally into this tombstone.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNRESTRICTED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_PSEUDO_QUEUE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE

name: dark_willow_terrorize
description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
lore: You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...
note: Terrorize provides vision on affected units.

name: hoodwink_acorn_shot
description:
Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit.  The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.
If point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets.  The ability may be placed on alt-cast to force this behavior.
lore: Though she'll make do with almost anything, Oak and Ironwood acorns make the most effective projectiles -- and the bulk of Hoodwink's stash.
note:
The same target can be hit more than once.
Bounces will seek units in the fog of war in a 525 radius, but not invisible units.
The planted tree lasts for 20 seconds.
Acorn Shot benefits from attack range bonuses.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_SILENCE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOT_LEARNABLE

name: muerta_grave_visitation
scepter_description: Adds new ability: muerta_grave_visitation.

name: special_bonus_unique_meepo_7
description: Can equip any item in the neutral item slot

name: special_bonus_unique_axe_8
localized_name: +12% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger

name: hoodwink_scurry
description: Hoodwink passively has a chance to evade physical attacks while near trees.  When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, attack and cast range, phased movement, and tree-walking for a brief time.
lore: There's not a nook or cranny in the Wood Tomo'kan out of reach of Hoodwink's paws.

name: special_bonus_unique_hoodwink_camouflage
description: Hoodwink becomes invisible near trees after **1.2** seconds of not moving, attacking, or casting spells.

name: hoodwink_hunters_boomerang
description: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage.
shard_description: Adds new ability: Hunter's Boomerang.

name: roshan_halloween_wave_of_force
description: After a delay, Roshan smashes the ground, causing massive radial damage in an area around him, knocking back all enemies.  The closer to Roshan the enemy is, the more damage it takes.

name: roshan_halloween_toss
description: Roshan tosses a nearby enemy unit at an enemy that is further away.

name: roshan_halloween_shell
description: Roshan becomes immune to physical damage, but takes enhanced magical damage for a brief time.  When Roshan uses Shell, all ability and item cooldowns are refreshed.

name: roshan_halloween_apocalypse
description: Roshan launches devastating beams of incineration from the sky at all enemy heroes outside of 400 range, but within 1200 range.

name: roshan_halloween_burn
description: Roshan breathes a lethal arc of searing fire.
